Sentencas: In the present research, microstructure, porosity, stresses and resistivity of thin platinum electrodes (thickness of 200 nm) deposited on titanium/silicon oxide/silicon and yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) substrates (the positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode (PEN) structure) were studied.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Platinum films were formed at different working pressure of argon gas in the chamber during magnetron sputter-deposition process and following thermal treatment.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Crystalline structure of the platinum (Pt) electrodes was analyzed using grazing incidence X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Lattice parameter and residual stresses of the platinum thin films were defined using sin(2)psi method.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Morphology of electrodes was investigated using atomic force microscopy.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy was used to study surface morphology of the platinum thin films and microstructural properties of the PEN structure.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Electrical properties of the platinum films were evaluated using the four-point probe method.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Typical time intervals and substrate temperature ranges were defined to produce stable porous Pt electrodes that are applicable in the PEN structure (Pt-YSZ-Pt).
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: It was found that lower Ar gas working pressure during magnetron sputtering results in denser and smoother platinum films.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Correspondingly, higher Ar gas pressure allows the production of porous platinum thin films without any thermal treatment.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure

Sentencas: Morphological changes of the Pt thin films were analyzed in the temperature region (500-800 degrees C) that is typical of operation of micro solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Influence of magnetron sputtering deposition conditions and thermal treatment on properties of platinum thin films for positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode structure
